quote: Catch, then, O catch the transient hour; Improve each moment as it flies!
author: St. Jerome

quote: Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free.
author: Stephen King

quote: Self-control is strength.
author: James Allen

quote: Your success and happiness lie in you.
author: Helen Keller

quote: I am who I am today because of the choices I made yesterday.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The big thing is to make a winning effort. I'm not obsessed with wins.
author: Morgan Wootten

quote: People spend too much time doing and not enough time thinking about what they should be doing.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: The Law of Concentration states that whatever you dwell upon grows. The more you think about something, the more it becomes part of your reality.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: You may be one person in this world, but to one person you may mean the world.
author: Unknown

quote: Anger, ego, jealousy are the biggest diseases. Keep yourself aloof from these three diseases.
author: Sathya Sai Baba

quote: Be polite to all, but intimate with few.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Whatever is begun in anger, ends in shame.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal or ideal.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Silence is sometimes the best answer.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: When you view failure as feedback, you get more done. When you view failure as a finality, you get nothing done.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: To avoid criticism, do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The strength of a wall is neither greater nor less than the courage of the men who defend it.
author: Genghis Khan

quote: If your happiness depends on what somebody else does, I guess you do have a problem.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Great minds discuss ideas. Average minds discuss events. Small minds discuss people.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Always render more and better service than is expected of you, no matter what your task may be.
author: Og Mandino

quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Speak when you are angry - and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: Misfortune shows those who are not really friends.
author: Aristotle

quote: If ever you feel like an animal among men, be a lion.
author: Criss Jami

quote: Animals don't hate, and we're supposed to be better than them.
author: Elvis Presley

quote: The best dreams happen when you're awake.
author: Cherie Gilderbloom

quote: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you have. Make the NOW the primary focus of your life.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: If you're brave enough to say goodbye, life will reward you with a new hello.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: The more you take responsibility for your past and present, the more you are able to create the future you seek.
author: Celestine Chua

quote: Yesterday is but today's memory, tomorrow is today's dream.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Nothing in the world is ever completely wrong. Even a stopped clock is right twice a day.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Forget safety. Live where you fear to live.
author: Rumi

quote: If your mind is empty, it is always ready for anything, it is open to everything.
author: Shunryu Suzuki

quote: Wrong does not cease to be wrong because the majority share in it.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: To get angry is like to revenge yourself for the guilt of others.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Try all things, hold fast that which is good.
author: John Locke

quote: The whole is greater than the sum of its parts.
author: Aristotle

quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, but remember to keep your feet on the ground.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: You become a worrier by practicing worry. You become free of worry by practicing the opposite.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: He who violates another's honor loses his own.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: When the fish is caught we pay no more attention to the trap.
author: Huang Po

quote: Courage is fear that has said its prayers and decided to go forward anyway.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Life doesn't get easier or more forgiving, we get stronger and more resilient.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Peace of mind is that mental condition in which you have accepted the worst.
author: Lin Yutang

quote: The wise accomplish all that they want without arousing the envy or scorn of others.
author: Ming-Dao Deng

quote: Men are equal; it is not birth but virtue that makes the difference.
author: Voltaire

quote: What we know is a drop, what we don't know is an ocean.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: Life is from the inside out. When you shift on the inside, life shifts on the outside.
author: Kamal Ravikant

quote: If you can change your mind, you can change your life.
author: William James

quote: Respect other people's feelings. It might mean nothing to you, but it could mean everything to them.
author: Roy T. Bennett
